name: ubie-sentry
description: Application Monitoring MVP - Similar to Sentry

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --workspace packages/error-monitoring-sdk && npm install --workspace packages/error-monitoring-server && npm install --workspace packages/demo-app
scripts.dev: npm run dev --workspace packages/error-monitoring-server & npm run dev --workspace packages/demo-app
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace packages/error-monitoring-sdk && npm run build --workspace packages/error-monitoring-server && npm run build --workspace packages/demo-app
